accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.note: To specify multiple tags for one login/password pair, use the separator: ;
accounts.add_tooltip: Click the icon to add a new account.

notification.error: An error occurred, please try again later.
notification.success_add: You have successfully added a new account!
notification.success_remove: You have successfully removed the account!
notification.success_update: You have successfully updated the account!
